title: LINE OF DEFENSE 3000AD 01 (of 03) (2013) (DC Comics) (digital) (
description:
Line of Defense #1 (of 3)

The Insurgents are determined to regain control of Arkangel, and their moment will come when Commander Dansing makes an inspection tour of Nightbridge Station. But when Akasuki Svenson gets her orders, she makes other plans!

DC Comics
Written by Ricardo Sanchez
Art by Brian Ching
Colored by Ikari Studio
Cover by Sergio Sandoval

Genres: Science Fiction, Video Games
22 Pages
Digital Release Date: Oct 8th 2013
Age Rating: 12+ Only

------

The Line of Defense mini-series will tell four stories, one each quarter starting this October, from both factions of the Lyrius conflict. The first arc, "Payback," is a revenge story. Insurgent soldier Akasuki Svenson has spent years fighting GALCOM oppression across the galaxy, waiting for an opportunity to get revenge on the GALCOM commander that destroyed her home. The window has finally opened, but she'll have to fight her way deep into enemy territory to exact vengeance.

"Payback" is a three part story beginning October 8th. The "Payback" story arc will also be collected as a limited edition comic book and made available as a free giveaway at the DC Entertainment booth at New York Comic-Con. Series writer Ricardo Sanchez will also be on hand signing copies.
